website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, affordable, and energy-efficient. The best choice for beautiful lights on a budget.
pros: Lightweight string with flexible design for easy hanging
Each solar-powered charge provides 10 hours of light
An affordable choice with 72 feet of length and eight modes
cons: The solar panel tends to malfunction if not shielded from rain

customer_reviews.title: I like the extra length and I wish I could buy ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights lit up the first evening I put them out in my yard. I like the extra length and I wish I could buy even longer ones. I also wish they came in other solid colors such as purple, pink, and blue. The lights were easy to put up without any help, just be sure to unwind them as you go and not all at once if possible. I have a lot of solar lights in my yard for my grandchildren and this brand seems to fit in nicely. I will be reordering this product, they've been in my garden for a few weeks now and are working beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Domi

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, great product
customer_reviews.text: Lights last well into 4am in the morning during the August days where sun exposure is at its peak. I have two of these outside lighting up the backyard fence. UPDATE 1/1/2018: These lights haven't turned on during Christmas due to lack of solar power. Let's see what happens once Spring comes around when the sun returns with its glory. If you found this review helpful, please hit the "Yes" button to encourage me to write more. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Photographer | Tech Pro | Outdoor EnthusiastTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: The lights worked great...for three days, then they shut down. We were very disappointed, they would have been perfect...if they worked. We even put the solar panel up on the roof where it would get a good charge.
customer_reviews.author: AZnana1019

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These string lights are awesome, I love them! I put them up on the deck around the railings and they look great! Easy to use, and doesnt look like Christmas lights, I wanted more of a cafe-type feel. And you cant really see them in the daytime, more of a subtle sparkle. I like all the light modes, the twinkling is fun and gives the backyard a fun feel. We used two 72ft strings for the entire back porch. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Low lighting and quality, died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be much dimmer than I thought they would be. I used them to light a small outdoor stairwell (5 steps, and I looped over 6 times) but it didn't help much in terms of lighting. Worse, I would set the program to a steady light, which wasn't the first setting but rather a number of clicks through, and then annoyingly, the lights would reset every 4-5 days to the default (flashing) and I would have to re-adjust the program. The nail in the coffin to this brand is that after 3 months, they stopped working altogether. Boo. Not worth your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Solar panel stopped working after a month's time
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with these lights. They functioned beautifully for a month and now they have completely stopped working. No amount of sunlight, direct or indirect, is enough to power them. Unfortunately they are now garbage. Save your money folks!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable!! I bought two
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable!! I bought two! They work from just sitting in the window and not being secured in the ground
customer_reviews.author: Elton and basha

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these lights; placed one in a small tree and did not open the second box. After two nights, the lights stopped working. I will remove the lights from the tree and return the defective string, as well as the unopened one. There is ample sunlight in the location where the solar panel is. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: We got a dud.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad. I ordered two of these and so far only 1 pack has been delivered. I got them early and rushed outside to wrap it around our tree so that it would get a few hours of sun light; We waited 7 hours and NOTHING. They don't work. I am REALLY hoping our next pack actually works. I would cancel but it's already on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Stopped lighting up after  2 days
customer_reviews.text: I charged the solar unit for a full 7 hours on arrival and tried it in the garage - worked well. I carefully attached the 72' of lights to my rear fence with insulated staples being very careful to not break any wire coating - worked fantastic......for 2 days. Opened the solar control box to check for any loose wires and tried a regular AA battery and even a new rechargeable battery - still didn't work. Taking this entire rune of lights is a royal pain, so I left it up. It sure would be nice if they would send me a new solar control unit so I can just swap tht out. Not too pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: John Corona

customer_reviews.title: Cant get them going consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they will not stay on. I could get one going, Then do the other and the first would be off. I tried covering the solar panel at night to make sure the light wasn't cutting them off. If I got them both going one was always off, when I checked after 20 minutes. Since Christmas day I took them down and have just tried to get them going and there seems to be no magic trick. they are easy to get on, they just want stay on. I bought them late in the season, maybe they got into some old stock or someting, but I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my backyard !
customer_reviews.text: I totally love those solar lights. I recently started working on my backyard and as one of the upgrades i wrapped those lights on my palm trees and it looks absolutely amazing. You can set up the lights to few different modes. I will be buying more to add it my palm threes in front of the house as well !! Great buy and definitely recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of just putting these up after buying them months ago. Set the solar panel in the sun before stringing them up to make sure they work which they did. Looked great! Strung them around my deck and they haven't worked since. Yesterday I thought it was because there wasn't enought sun, but it was in the sun all day today and all I can get is a faint glow in the first couple dozen lights. If the company reads these, should all the lights light up or does the number lit depend on how much solar power the panel stored?
customer_reviews.author: Colleen D. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty while it lasted (not long)
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these lasted less than a year. I also didn't like that they didn't turn on automatically every day. I have them wrapped around my deck railings and I had to go out every day and press the buttons to turn them on and cycle through 8 patterns to get the sequence that I wanted. I have a strand from another vendor that's been working daily for 2+ years, with no intervention. The other strand lasted through 2 harsh winters. These didn't make it through 1.
customer_reviews.author: LMBox

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months, then junk
customer_reviews.text: So I originally rated this as 5 stars due to price and it worked very well for the first month, second, third, forth month, it would intermittently not turn on or off and I had to manually go out at night and hit the on button etc, now 11.5 months later I am writing this review to let others know, doesn’t even turn on anymore, living in Florida with full sun, the actual solar panel has faded white. I still have my LED plug in lights I bought from Walmart years ago and they still work great. This is good for a few months use, that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: M. L

customer_reviews.title: Just decides not to turn on
customer_reviews.text: When they work they're fine BUT... Unless they get day after day of sun they just turn off and won't come back regardless of the amount of sunshine. I missed the return by 2 days (in mid-winter - not going out there!) or I would have gotten my money back. Walking out to physically turn them on (sometimes a dozen pushes on/off) is maddening. Do not buy unless you want to go out and push buttons to turn them on almost every night.
customer_reviews.author: Norman C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: poor product quality, non-existant customer service
customer_reviews.text: When they worked, they were awesome. But after a month, one of my two strings purchased quit coming on at night. Since they were on my garage roof, it was a pain to climb the ladder to manually turn them on every night. After another month, they failed to come on at all. I am in SoCal and the PV was aimed toward the southern skies, directly toward the sun. The second string acted the same, but lasted another month before failing. I contacted the seller and he replied after a month and said he was sending new lights. That was three months ago. Bottom line: poor product quality, non-existant customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective after rain ... replaced 2 times ... all defective ... money refunded ... vendor aware
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these lights appear to be poorly weatherproofed as the first string failed after a rain storm. Subsequently the replacement strings (2x) failed as well. In all I've received 3 strings from the vendor all of which do not operate after a rain. The vendor is very responsive and even after replacing the product twice has refunded my money and indicated that they've alerted the manufacturing facility of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights, short life span if using daily.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little frustrating to unwind. There are multiple settings for patterns of blinking. Once turned off, the chosen pattern does not stuck - it goes back to the first pattern. We had these for a party in the country. They weren't obnoxiously bright, but did help direct people from here to there very well. We decided to leave them up for the season - I would keep them up year round, honestly. But they died completely after about 2 months. Will I order them again? Possibly. Will I keep them up for daily enjoyment? No. I would just use them for special occasions and store them when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Dub

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: We chose these just for visual effect, not for light. If you are interested in light to see by, keep looking. However, if you just need a little sparkle, a little glimmer to enhance your environment, these are PERFECT. We put these on our upstairs porch, and they are exactly what we were looking for. They come on at dusk each evening and last all night. If the day is very cloudy or rainy, they’re off by the time I awaken in the 6:00 hour, but if the previous day was bright they’re still going strong. I highly recommend these tiny lights.
customer_reviews.author: MsWalker

customer_reviews.title: Quit working the next day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they specifically say "Waterproof IP65 Solar String Lights Outdoor Indoor Patio..." As soon as they came in, I wrapped them around the tree in my yard and put the solar panel in the sun. That night they turned on automatically as promised, and I was excited to see that. The next night I was expecting them to turn on and.... nothing. It's been a year since I bought these and I'm so disgusted that I still haven't taken them off the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They were very pretty when I got them I even orded 2 more sets. They have been up for three days and now 1 whole strand doesn't work. It's really crappy when you spend your hard earned money to make your house look special then you end up with poor products. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are terrible. They cannot possibly be the same lights that I see in some of the pictures in some of the reviews. These are so dim, you can barely see them. In addition to that, the functionality is terrible. The power does not usually work. It has a mind of its own. You cannot tell if the power button is on or off. And it just doesn’t work right.
customer_reviews.author: Raebae

customer_reviews.title: Bright, dancing and long lasting lights.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used these lights for two years. The first year they traveled with us as we rv’d and strung them up in various campgrounds. Last spring 2019 we placed them on a small evergreen at home and left them there. Pleased to see they continue to shine brightly! The only drawback is that the wire can easily knot so special care is needed when wrapping up. Also works best in dark areas away from streetlights.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Westendorf

customer_reviews.title: After only 5 months the battery will not charge and the product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice, and the original one I purchased is still up and running, however the second Solar Light set that I purchased only 5 months ago has already stopped working and wont charge the battery. Very sad as this was a Christmas Present to my husband for our garden and looked wonderful. The original set is still at my cabin working very well. Would like to return it and get another one to replace it, but the web site does not exist when I type it in and that is the way they ask you to communicate. I am sure that I received a dud the second time round.
customer_reviews.author: Avril

customer_reviews.title: nice lights, works great in so many places
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights initially to put around some tress in my yard . It looks so nice and lasted so late into the evening that I figured the would work great as a night light if they are strung around the ceiling . Its perfect, adds just enough after glow and my daughter loves it. Its been over a year and it still lasts for 3 - 4 hours after sun set. Would be nice if the batteries on the solar panel could be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: gadget guy

customer_reviews.title: These were great when they worked!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted a good month or 2 and were awesome. Then they stopped working completely , out of the blue. I didn’t know solar could even quit working on you until these. Lol! $13 per set for 1 month use is a waste of money. More so, the hour I spent wrapping them around the tree , perfectly spaced out , so that they would be on the right way:for good, all for basically nothing - is probably the most disappointing part. Boooo
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Tibs

customer_reviews.title: Was great for a while, now they don't work
customer_reviews.text: I once gave these the review below until they just about a week ago stopped working. They will turn on for about 20 seconds and then that's it. It's such a bummer because it took so long to put them all throughout my fairy garden and now I have to take them and throw them away. Bummer These are amazing soooooo many lights. I used them for my fairy garden. Great product. Comes on every night on its own. No plug in or wasting batteries. There are tons of settings also. Fast blinking lights, slow, steady, fade in and out. Great product and great price
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Scott

customer_reviews.title: These are great but I don't appreciate that I found the same ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great but I don't appreciate that I found the same thing two for twelve dollars on another listing AFTER I ordered this one! It seems to be by the same seller too so beware this listing is apparently overpriced bigtime
customer_reviews.author: Shane Peters

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these lights that have completely failed. It was great of amazon to send an immediate replacement for the first set that also failed. However after installing these outside and waiting for the lights to charge, we come find that evening that only half of the lights work in this set also. Disappointed to say the least. My review: don’t bother. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great string of lights to use where you don't have power. Mounted my solar panel on the top of a bamboo pole to get the most sun it could along the fence line, then I strung the lights in my Japanese Maple along the lower branches. There are multiple settings for the lights, but I just use the steady on. One thing of note, you have to turn them on each evening. Which I sometimes I forget!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cresci

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Have had product over a month... However, I am just now getting around to reviewing it. Product arrived and came in a Christmas themed box. The lights seemed to be well made. I turned it on, and it worked or literally 2 seconds, and then went out. Since then I have tried charging it in various spots, inside and outside, always in direct sunlight. It does not work. So, the product seemed nice... but unless you need lights that DO NOT work, just don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the customer service I received from Ankway. I left a previous review and mentioned that 4-5 of the lights didn’t light up after I had already placed them around the trunk of a very tall palm tree. I loved the lights except for that and was upset with myself for not checking them prior to getting in a ladder. Ankway contacted me immediately, apologized that I wasn’t 100% satisfied & offered to send out another strand free of charge. AWESOME! Love solar fairy lights and use them in several places in my yard. Will definitely order from Ankway again.
customer_reviews.author: lonestar mike

customer_reviews.title: Teeny lights!
customer_reviews.text: This package is TINY! Much much smaller than I expected, since it is 72 feet I was expecting more! I'm hoping once they are up on the tree for outdoor ambiance it will be noticeable and beautiful. Fingers crossed. I did a trial run of the lights and it did have some nice sequences but hoping that it will be a nice addition to the yard
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best item on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: At first receiving these lights the boxes were so much smaller the expected but after wrapping them around trees and bushes they made my backyard a dreamland. I bought several for gifts to others and they all fell in love with these lights and then they bought more as well. It might be nice in the future to have various color choices like amber, blue, purple, red. I'd give these lights the highest rating possible. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for deck!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these last summer and used them on our deck railing. We really love bed them. I probably should have removed them before the winter came though. Just purchased two more for this summer. After awhile, it did seem like they stopped working. But I just needed to hit the button and it was ok again. This happened a few times, but really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: drgreeley

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the price, but honestly, it's quite finicky on when it will work or not. Was hoping for a set and forget option but having it for a week at least half the nights I've had to manually re turn it on. It needs to be ON to charge (according to limited instructions), but no light or anything to indicate if the on/off single button is actually on or off. I've resorted to covering the panel to test on and off during the daylight to make sure it's on to charge. Wouldn't buy again. Pros - it's long, and lights are bright (when it works)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why do they shut off after 48 hours?!
customer_reviews.text: So far they look great. However, they shut off after two days. For example, if I turn them on (using the buttom) tonight, they will stay on until sunrise, then again tomorrow night. But on the third night they have to be turned on again using the button... not exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting portable light
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets, both worked very well. After charging both indoors (several hours in a room with bright LED ceiling lights) both sets lasted at least twelve hours. One even lasted close to a full 24 hours! Just to let others know, I don't think these are as bright as AC-powered lights, but that's the trade-off you make to get the portability of solar-powered plus the long-lasting light
customer_reviews.author: KE Hall

customer_reviews.title: These worked alright for 5 weeks, then they went kaput
customer_reviews.text: This string of lights was easy to install. Setting the mode was a little tricky. I wrapped the copper strings around my outdoor tree trunks on the patio. I stuck the solar part in a planter. They worked ok for a little over a month, then they died, never to be revived again. They weren't all that bright, but the twinkling was nice while it lasted. This seems to happen with a lot of the solar-powered LED lights that I have purchased. They are just not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stack

customer_reviews.title: One is not enough!
customer_reviews.text: I had similar lights last year and I keep them on the outside of my home from November until they stop working. Three of the four strands I got are still working. These are a totally different look and I Love them. I ordered another pair so that I had enough for the trunks of the trees. They look truly beautiful. Oh, and they also don't need to be turned on and off manually at dark or dawn. Now that's convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Mommosan

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome! They work perfectly on the railing of my balcony and all I did was just tape up the solar panel on the top corner of the railing with black duct tape. They are set on the nighttime mode, so when dusk hits, the lights automatically go on. They can be set on different modes,twinkling,fading bright to low, steady light etc. and were long enough to wrap around the entire balcony top railing twice. I have had so many compliments on them from neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Aalicia_85

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first and I loved it. But after a couple weeks it would turn off. Tjen every time it would rain or get windy. Then it would only go on with just a glimmer but you could only see it was on up very close. It didn't even last 3 month's. I don't know if all solat light do this because I did get a different set for a different place and it does the same thing. I thought solar lights would work lo,ger then a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund or a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: They are not working anymore in Less than 2 months. Very disappointing! And the return window period has passed because is only 1 month I think.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 Months and has already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this 2 1/2 months ago and it has already stopped working. Very disappointed, as I love the product, but not if its not going to last. A couple of weeks ago (Before the 1st set went out) I purchased another set to add to my patio.....now I'm waiting to see if that one will stop working as well. The product is very bright and nice around my deck, and I'm just hoping I received a bad one and a new one can be sent to me. If I am given a replacement, I will update the product to see if it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: CWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but did not survive winter
customer_reviews.text: This was a lovely product that lit up my front yard magnolia tree well. Unfortunately it did not make it through the winter (which was harsh here in Buffalo, NY). I am not necessarily surprised by this, but I had hoped perhaps it would last so I would not have to re-string it every season. I will buy again and take it up and down every spring and fall but would love this product more if it could last in all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Schiebs

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets and neither of them worked at all.. i gave it 2 nights to come on...and nothing... of course i would get the duds. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Gloss

customer_reviews.title: They don't last!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are easy to install and have multiple modes to choose from. I put them around my screened in pool and they looked really nice the first few weeks. However, they only lasted two weeks so I am very disappointed in this purchase. I have had solar lights last for two years and through a hurricane. If you are looking for longevity do not purchase these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: Have ordere several strings for outdoor patio. After less than two months the newer strings stopped working. Thought it was due to older lights on copper wire but all of them say they are copper (although they appear silvery) and they all are rated for outdoors. Would not buy again. Have some older lights from several years ago that are obviously copper and still work. These may be a different brand tho.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for camping. Strung them on my canopy and they were a big hit with my friends. They are pretty bright at night at the campground. Had to turn them off when going to bed or else the light was shining too bright. Solar is great since I don’t have to worry about batteries running out and all the different lighting patterns are fun to choose from. They pack up tiny and light.
customer_reviews.author: angelaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but junk.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty to begin with.... I had them wrapped around a big maple tree in my back yard and it was so gorgeous after dark.... Then like so many of the other complaints, it died. No reason. Just died. I thought maybe it didn't get enough sun one day, but no - it just doesn't light up at all any more. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SOLAR. Panel is a photosensitive switch.
customer_reviews.text: NOT SOLAR. The panel is just a photo sensor that turns the lights on or off when it detects external light. The lights work with AA batteries. They still are a great option for decorative lighting. Plus it is supper long.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Yarrow

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the product, but arrived broken. One of the wires that connected it to the control box was outside the heat shrink tubing and not connected. Such a shame. Probably just a QA issue, but had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and returned 3 times.There was always some sort of issue with the wires. They seem to be too delicate and not for outdoor use. The third time I ordered these lights they only worked if I held both of my hands on the wire. Waste of time, and money trying to get them to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So easy for so much enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. Set them up correctly and enjoy. If they stop working, you just have to change the AA battery inside the solar panel. It's easy and doesn't need to be changed very often. I have 3 strings of these lights in use every night for over 3 months. Only one string of lights needed a new battery so far. I plan on using mine all year long. They make my balcony so relaxing in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t flicker randomly in the firefly mode. All blink at same time.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these lights so I don’t know how long they’ll last. Though they are brite and have different modes of display I was disappointed with the “firefly” mode. They don’t do a random flicker as would be expected by a firefly. They all blink off and on at the same time. It’s just not the same effect I was hoping for. They are small and on a thin wire so you can have them hiding in your flowers during the day and get a nice effect at night.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Charming Lights, Charming Life
customer_reviews.text: These were terrific for my outdoor Christmas decorating this year. Even on cloudy days these warm, glowing mini-lights were going strong. They have a timer option which is great. They turn on at dark and turn off while I and most of my neighbors are asleep. Sure, the early morning newspaper deliveryman doesn't get to enjoy them but, based on the speed with which he drives by and tosses my newspaper, I'd say he isn't looking at Christmas lights anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Marcianne Waters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patio Addition
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent set of lights. I used them to upgrade my backyard. They are easy to hang due to the light weight and have withstood multiple run storms in the past few weeks. They are hassle free once you hang them - you don't have to worry about electrical problems and they come on automatically. There are several different "flashing" patterns or you can choose to have them lit solid. Time will tell what to overall life span will be. The lights come pre-charged so test them as soon as they are delivered. I was so impressed with them, I ordered two more strands.
customer_reviews.author: KJ!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these several times to use on my balcony. They give out a soft inviting lighting to any outdoor area. Excellent for night time entertaining! If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below so that I know! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Beautiful Exactly How You Want It!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are a wonderful soft white LED. These are solar powered copper wired very nice for LED. They are a nice long length, with equally spaced lights. They do tangle easily and it is best when decorating to keep the lights on their cardboard spool. The modes are easily switched with a press of a button as well as the on and off button. Overall a very nice set of copper wire lights.
customer_reviews.author: Stefmav1

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 sets of these lights. 1 functions ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these lights. 1 functions perfectly- comes on at dusk and stays lit well into the early morning hours, however the other 2 do not always come on automatically. They are painstakingly & perfectly wrapped around trees in the backyard so I have chosen to go outside and turn them on manually if needed rather than take them down and exchange. When working as described- they are a lovely touch. When not- takes 30 seconds to go out and turn them on.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Work AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought TONS of solar lights for my yard in at my house in Mexico and these are the ONLY ones that stand up to the rainy season and work. First pair I bought are still going strong 2 years later! None others I have bought lasted more than 6 months. I HIGHLY recommend these, and you also cannot see the wire once it's in the plant, and the twinkle feature is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Jules Boulahrouz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t see how this is called a light
customer_reviews.text: We have a few of these from other companies some take batteries. These are the worst out of all the ones we have. They hardly light up a thing, even if I wrap these up and put them next to another set we have that takes batteries this whole string is less bright than just one bulb from the other. So I can say confidently these aren’t worth a dollar let alone the price listed. Shop elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 5 stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves a zero out of five stars! Because 0 of 5 worked. I purchased 5 of these solar lights for each of my cypress trees. The first few weeks they worked fine. But one by one they all stopped working. Within 3 months all 5 have stopped working. I always read reviews prior to my purchases. I looked past the bad reviews on this product but I’ll never do that again! The reviews are true! Don’t buy this solar light!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Have had this set up for over a week now, followed all instructions that were included, wires are not compromised or torn, and still not one single light on. I live in Southern Nevada where the temps have been 106° and there's no shortage of burning, hot sunlight, so that's not the issue. I'm very disappointed. Bought 2 sets of these to use for my 1/2 acre yard, was planning on buying A LOT more, but if I can't even get the first box to work, they'll go back. I've sent an email to the companie"s customer service so I will wait first to see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solar string lights
customer_reviews.text: I added a cross to my yard for Easter and decided to go with these lights. It is now the first of May and these lights are still working wonderfully. This have been a great addition to my yard as I never have to fumble to turn them on or do anything other than waiting for nightfall so they will start twinkling away. Will definitely buy more of these in the future as my yard projects grow. Would make some great fairy lights. ahhh the possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Adamson

customer_reviews.title: How can I contact seller to fullfil warranty?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in July 2017 and it stopped working 6 month later, how can I contact seller to receive a replacement. In product details it specify 1 year warranty; EFFICIENT ABSORPTION & CONVERTION --- LED christmas lights designed with the solar panel and rechargeable battery, the solar lights string can work for about 8 hours at night if the panel absorbs enough sunshine during day.12 Months Warranty, welcome to contact us with any request.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY - if you need actual advertised length
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT 72 ft. They are 50 ft. Ankway CS tried the excuse that "the length includes the power lead". Yeah, deceptive however even including that the full length was only 50'. They did send me a different unit - that was also only 50 ft. Also - do NOT attempt to staple these up - it breaks and shorts the cable. Other than that, they do work and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: ATechnoholic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great! I bought 5 different strands/brands to test out. These are by far the best and half the price of the only other strand which was just as good. I’ve seriously ordered tons of them! They don’t take from the lovely night sky but offer a beautiful twinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rae

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far- have to be very careful not to break the very thin wire though
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for Christmas lights. The wire is very fine so you will probably want to be careful with it. I like that it's so light weight. Works well and we've had some rainy days. I'm going to buy more for next year. On the rainy days, expect the lights to stay on for only a few hours but that's fine with me. We've had it for 2-3 weeks so I can't speak to longevity. Edit: Removed from the tree and the copper filament broke despite trying to be careful. Area before the break still works and lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Bay area mom

customer_reviews.title: Lights Look Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lights look beautiful but they DO NOT not come on every night, like they are supposed to!! I have to physically turn them on again and again that can be a little diffucult since they are wrapped around tree trunks in planters, not sure what the problem is but they should come at dark every night, every night is a surprise as to weather they will come on or not, it is very frustrating!!!! They get full sun, I live in Arizona, and I have five trees wrapped with the same lights and some come on and some don't, uggggggggggg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why do they stop working?
customer_reviews.text: What causes them to stop working. . . . I have bought so many. . .. .always follow directions. The first one I bought a few years ago still lights up. . . But the newer ones don’t last but a few months. I do all the tricks you suggest to get them working again, but I notice the screen seems to get a whiteish film over the face. Can this be scrubbed off. .. .does it play a part in it not working. Does the wire have to be stretched out as well. Please get back to me ASAP. I really like them and given several as gifts. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: concetta atwood

customer_reviews.title: they didn't last long enough to make it worth the effort to put them out
customer_reviews.text: i got 2 of these sets and put them out as holiday decorations they lasted about 2 weeks before they failed and even during that time they were extremely dim. Since I got 2 sets I can assume this is just the way they are and not just a bad set. I ended up putting both sets in the trash I can't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Willow L.

customer_reviews.title: These lights were great, and came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These lights were great, and came as advertised. At first I thought they weren't working; user error, the sun has to go down to see if they've charged properly, and they were! They had different speeds, from fast, to slow, to dimming, to staying on constant. I loved them, and even had the panel in a not so sunny part of my yard, but it still charged! Unfortunately my black lab got ahold of the panel when I wasn't paying attention, RIP solar string lights, but I will definitely be purchasing again! They are a great addition to our deck!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I have two sets on my patio as I have to outlet. Auto on and off, multiple modes and subtle 10/18: one of the two sets stopped working and customer service sent me a new set without question! Great service, I will always buy my patio lights from this company
customer_reviews.author: Awesome73

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 modes and none of them are solid
customer_reviews.text: These are defective or misleading. My set only has three modes: firefly, chasing light and strobe. The listing states there are 8 modes and I bought them to have a steady light. UPDATE: March 10, 2019 Lights stopped working after a month. This is the second set we own that stopped working. TOTAL JUNK
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: They stay lit all night in July in MN
customer_reviews.text: I am sad they do NOT twinkle. They do flash on and off, and have some other odd patterns, but for those of you who appreciate a good twinkle, these do not twinkle. I wish I were more creative as they are just outlining my shed in some boring lines. I think I should have purchased curtain lights. Maybe I'll do that and move these elsewhere. Maybe I could outline some tomato cages! These stay lit all night. The next day's morning sun turns them off. I'm pleased with the warm white color and how long they stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wrap around a bottle arch in my garden. It worked - sort of. This gives you the option of different light settings. I thought that was great until the button to change it wouldn’t work. It cycled through all the light sequences without letting me choose the one I wanted. On the third night it stopped working completely. Will be returning. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Problems continually
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work properly. My lights are outside. I have to reset either the pattern every other day or turn them back on. This is really annoying as I have to wait til dark so that I can reset them properly....once in a while is ok....continuously is not! PLEASE NOTE - I was sent a replacement but only one - I ordered two sets and both have the same problem as stated above. However, I don't know if the issue has been resolved since they stated the controller was going out .. if not a product defect then why would this happen for both sets??? Should have at least sent replacements for both malfunctioning sets not just one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but great idea - solar
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews I read were very good, it then I must have gotten the ruby of the litter because my lights did not work well. I wanted these for a specific weekend and I am disappointed that they did not work our. Darn! When they did work, they gave out just the right amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Njlatinashopper

customer_reviews.title: Short time lit up and don't come on
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to put on a wall without using the stick and they don't stay lit up more then 3-4hours. My other sets from a different company have been on every night for over a year and stay lit all night even in our dark snowy winter plus, one of the 2 sets I ordered only comes on when it wants 2.....I have to turn it on/off a few times b4 it comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a garden project.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my project... I added these to a watering can in the garden...saw a tutorial on Pinterest... You take the wire and un fold it...as you un fold and straighten the wire, make several deep folds... I got about 10 or so deeper folds... then you tie the end up and let the wires " flow" from the spout of the can...photo below
customer_reviews.author: RED 1215

customer_reviews.title: 2x Don't Light up after the first week
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, worked perfectly for the first week and now neither of them light up. No obvious signs of damage to explain why. Maybe I'm just unlucky, but that's quite a coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Picked these up to put some fun lights in my son's room
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to put some fun lights in my son's room. They work really well - I mounted the solar panel in a small window he has, out of the way, and strung up the lights around the rest of the room. Just like when I was a kid and had christmas lights in my room, without the electric usage that goes with it. They're really the perfect amount of light for this, as well. Probably going to get a second set for my porch, too.
customer_reviews.author: derek gelinas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these fairy lights! They are very small - they are not for illuminating a space. However, they give a cheerful and romantic ambiance! They have quite a few settings, I prefer the twinkle setting. Still work despite the rain and foliage growth. The copper wire made it super easy to wrap around the branches of my tree without getting tangled! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice lights lasted 16 months year round in Wisconsin 4 seasons. One day they just stopped working. I wrapped them around my deck for a nice ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: MeXs3

customer_reviews.title: I may be sending this back as it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I may be sending this back as it does not operate properly. Sometimes it remains on for 4-5 hours and other times it turns itself off after random lengths of time. It is not because of lack of solar charge as it has been consistently sunny since I started using it. When I check it, the switch is turned off. And no one has turned it off. Not sure if I will keep it. I think it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy these again. While the sun shines on the pad, most nights they don’t light automatically so I go out and hit the button. The string below them from a different vendor with the pad in the same place works perfectly. Probably will toss these!
customer_reviews.author: Neil San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration for outside
customer_reviews.text: These work!! I was spending XMas with family somewhere else, and missed having a XMas tree in the house. So ... I bought this, and strung it on a small tree outside the door. Every night, I had these wonderful, automatic twinkly lights. There are several different modes you can choose (steady, blinking, slow on and off, etc.) which is fun. I almost don't want to take them down! It has been raining on and off for a few weeks, and these continue to work. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lookin' Good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same lights before and had them on my deck for over a year. The only time they did not work was if it was cloudy for more than 3-4 days in a row. Once in a while they would accidentally turn off in a downpour of rain. They look great and have several different modes to enjoy. The only reason I replaced them was that I needed to paint my entire deck so I had to take the old ones off anyway. Since they are cheap enough, I just purchased new ones.
customer_reviews.author: historian74

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I put these on trees by our deck and look gorgeous!! Have gotten lots of compliments!! It comes with 8 modes of flickering so I can change them anytime easily. They arrived a day early and exactly as described. I would order from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Christmas outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year had them outside for a month. I was amazed to see these were just as bright and all the lights still flicker on glow which ever setting you put them on. Great products and long lasting
customer_reviews.author: LA_TN

customer_reviews.title: ... for 4 months without any problem I was however disappointed when I found that the lights had very little ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are bright burn for a long time however the photograph looks as though there's a protective tubing around the lights there is not simply insulated copper wire strands between each of the lights which is about 4 inches between lights they would have worked for me for 4 months without any problem I was however disappointed when I found that the lights had very little insulated wire in between them.
customer_reviews.author: furg

customer_reviews.title: Like the product they look nice on the fence you ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the product they look nice on the fence you can hardly see the wire during the day but at night when you turn them on the only thing that I don't like is when you turn it off and turn it back on and makes you go to a different lighting scheme we really want to just leave them on so every time you have to click through which is not a Euge problem but it would be nice if they would just stay where they were so you had an option if you wanted to leave them solid instead of flashy .
customer_reviews.author: David C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Days :-(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago and only got around to installing them a few weeks ago - they worked for 2 nights and then stopped working. I tried everything to get them working again but no luck. Disappointed in this product. It is not as much about the cost but the time it took me to string this up is all wasted.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Light up the Night!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to outdoor nighttime activities. Lighten up areas without a lot of bright glare, but nice soft light that really does not attract bugs! Easy to set up and the light display choices give you many moods to set them to. So far the solar charge is exceptional, lasting to very early AM.+++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: joelfarm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and well built
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set of these and they looked so nice on my deck I bought a few more. Unfortunately one set was defective, but the others all work perfectly and look beautiful. These aren't very bright, as they're tiny little LEDs, so if you're looking for lighting to see by go with something else. But if you're looking for decorative lights that feel sturdy, these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft lighting with multiple settings, that can be placed anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of fairy lights I've purchased. The first lasted about a year. I wanted to replace the dead ones, and bumped up from a 100 led set to a 200 led. They light up as soon as the sky goes dark, have multiple settings, and last a good 6 hours or more. They are softly beautiful and add a lovely ambiance to your evening setting.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed to say the least -
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed .. I bought 3 set in July and they did not last a month. The lights don't come on automatically any more and I have to reset them each night. One of them lasts for 5 min and shuts off . They are completely exposed to sun for recharge. I bought these because I bought one almost 3 years ago and it is still working today Thru rain wind and 6' of snow. These new one are truly disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful yellow warm color
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I was skeptical that this was really 72 feet of LED lights but as I unwound them I was pleasantly surprised to find that they were exactly as advertised! I have these lights installed along a fence and they are amazing - a pleasant yellow color, not a harsh white like some LEDs. These are decorative and should not be considered for lighting where safety is an issue, like for stairs, but for decorative purposes they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

product_meta.title: Solar String Lights, Ankway 200 LED Fairy Lights 8 Modes 3-Strands Copper Wire 72 ft Waterproof IP65 Solar String Lights Outdoor Indoor Patio Garden Christmas Decorative (Warm White)
feature_bullets: 200 LED BRILLIANT LIGHTS --- 200 Super Bright LED bulbs on 72 feet, 2M/6.56ft length of leading wire high quality solar string lights outdoor. Ideal for decorating your gardens, patio, yard, wedding, party,restaurant,christmas tree, etc.

3-STRAND COPPER WIRE LIGHTS --- This solar string lights is made of durable, bendable & waterproof IP65 3-strand copper wire, durable enough to expirement with any shapes. So it can be used outdoors as well (please kindly note lights can not be immersed in water)
8 LIGHTING MODES --- Gorgeous lighting modes including combination, fireflies flashing, waves, fading, chasing/flashing, fading slowly, twinkle/flashing and steady on.

EASY TO INSTALL --- This solar fairy lights is thin and flexible . So you can build the shapes you want easily , it's easy to store also.Led string lights is wonderful for outdoor christmas decorations.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION & CONVERTION --- LED christmas lights designed with the solar panel and rechargeable battery, the solar lights string can work for about 8 hours at night if the panel absorbs enough sunshine during day.12 Months Warranty, welcome to contact us with any request.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars3,000 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
